{
  accessRequestsForDataset(datasetID: "{{ .dataset_id }}"){
    subject
    subjectType
    owner
    polly{
      externalID
      name
      url
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "accessRequestsForDataset": [
      {
        "subject": "mock.anderson@email.com",
        "subjectType": "user",
        "owner": "user:mock.anderson@email.com",

      },
